mean_cn: n. 电话（机）；  v. 打电话
mean_en: a system for talking to somebody else over long distances, using wires or radio; a machine used for this; the part of the telephone that you hold in your hand and speak into
sentence: There's a telephone call for you.
word_etyma: tele远，传送 + phone声音 → 远方声音传过来 → 电话
